storytelling.title_highlight: from Central Africa to the world.
storytelling.description: We connect local innovation to global transformations by turning challenges into market opportunities.
storytelling.image_event_desc: Forums, hackathons and meetups to connect the ecosystem
storytelling.journey_description: Complete and tailored support, from idea to entrepreneurial success.

ideation.title: Train & Strengthen
ideation.description: Practical training, personalized coaching and mentorship to develop the entrepreneurial and technical skills needed for success.

prototype.title: Connect & Animate
prototype.description: An active network of partners, investors and entrepreneurs. Co-creation spaces where ideas come to life and collaborations are born.

scale.title: Innovate & Impact
scale.description: Structuring projects that use technology to solve local challenges and create sustainable impact at scale.

storytelling.quote: It's not just an innovation hub. It's a place where dreams become businesses, where talents find their way, and where each success inspires an entire generation of entrepreneurs.
storytelling.author: Cinolu — Collective

why_join_us.title: Why join
why_join_us.description: Since 2015, Cinolu has been an innovation hub in Lubumbashi supporting youth, women and innovators through technology, entrepreneurship and collaboration.

slide_2.title: Accelerating talents
slide_2.description: The Lubumbashi Innovation Center (Cinolu) is a vibrant space where ideas become solutions to build smart, inclusive and sustainable cities.

slide_3.title: Transform your ideas
slide_3.description: Benefit from personalized support, access to quality resources and a network of passionate entrepreneurs to bring your projects to life.

hero.title: About
hero.description: Our history and passion guide a committed team, dedicated to providing you with impeccable service.

about.title: Who
about.paragraph_1: Cinolu – Lubumbashi Innovation Center is an innovation, incubation and support space founded in 2015, dedicated to catalyzing entrepreneurial and technological potential in the Democratic Republic of Congo.
about.paragraph_2: We act as a one-stop shop (OneStop) to connect talents to opportunities through innovation, technology and entrepreneurship for social impact.
about.paragraph_3: The Cinolu OneStop digital platform was designed to centralize support pathways, automate processes (membership, application, mentoring) and enhance collective impact.
about.quote: Connecting talents to opportunities to transform our African cities through innovation, technology and entrepreneurship.

vision.title: Our
vision.description: Building smarter, more inclusive and resilient African cities by mobilizing entrepreneurship, technological innovation and multi-stakeholder collaboration.

mission.title: Our
mission.description: Supporting innovators, entrepreneurs and entrepreneurship support organizations (ESOs) in developing sustainable and inclusive solutions, by fostering co-creation, experimentation and multi-stakeholder collaboration.

history.title: Our
history.subtitle: Discover the key milestones that have shaped our organization over the years.

item_1.description: Launch of Cinolu, the 1st innovation hub in Lubumbashi

item_2.description: Implementation of gender & youth programs (F360, civic tech…)

item_3.description: Deployment of the Ushindi incubator and entrepreneurial cohorts

item_4.description: Regional deployment (SOPA+, Afrilabs, Fikiri…) and creation of Cinolu OneStop

item_5.description: Complete digital structuring of support and impact

our_impact.title: Our
our_impact.subtitle: Figures that demonstrate our commitment and impact in the field

apply.title: Become a Mentor
apply.subtitle: Share your expertise and guide tomorrow's entrepreneurs

experience_step.title: Your Experience
experience_step.subtitle: Indicate your years of professional experience
experience_step.years_help: Indicate the total number of relevant professional experience years
experience_step.why_text: This information helps us better understand your background and match you with entrepreneurs who will benefit most from your expertise.

expertise_step.title: Your Areas of Expertise
expertise_step.subtitle: Select at least one area in which you excel
expertise_step.error_required: Please select at least one expertise

profile_cta.title: Become a Mentor
profile_cta.description: Share your expertise and guide tomorrow's entrepreneurs. Join our community of mentors and make a difference.

approved.label: Approved
approved.title: Congratulations!
approved.message: Your mentor profile has been approved. You can now access your mentor dashboard and start supporting entrepreneurs.

pending.label: Pending
pending.title: Application under review
pending.message: Your application to become a mentor is currently under review. Our team will contact you soon with a response.

rejected.label: Rejected
rejected.title: Application rejected
rejected.message: Unfortunately, your application has not been accepted at this time. You may submit a new application after gaining more experience.

application_pending.title: Application pending
application_pending.message: Your application to become a mentor has been received and is currently under review by our team.

review.title: Application review
review.description: Our team is reviewing your profile, experiences, and areas of expertise.

evaluation.title: Evaluation (3-5 days)
evaluation.description: We will verify that your profile meets our mentorship criteria.

notification.title: Email notification
notification.description: You will receive an email with the final decision and next steps.

meanwhile.title: In the meantime...
meanwhile.message: While we review your application, you can continue to use the platform normally and explore available opportunities.
meanwhile.tip: We recommend completing your profile and adding your biography to increase your chances of approval.

application_rejected.title: Application rejected
application_rejected.message: Thank you for your interest in becoming a mentor. Unfortunately, your application has not been accepted at this time.

experience.title: Insufficient experience
experience.description: We are looking for mentors with solid experience in their field.

expertise.title: Areas of expertise
expertise.description: The selected areas of expertise do not match our current needs.

profile.title: Incomplete profile
profile.description: Some important information is missing from your profile or application.

steps.develop: Continue to develop your expertise and professional experience
steps.complete: Complete your profile with more details about your background
steps.reapply: You can submit a new application in 3 months

encouragement.title: Don't get discouraged!
encouragement.message: This decision is not final. We encourage all passionate professionals to continue developing their skills and apply again when their profile is more aligned with our criteria. Your desire to share your expertise is valuable and we thank you for your commitment to our community.
